import re
def is_valid_URL(str):
	regex\
 = ("((http|https)://)(www.)?" +
			"[a-zA-Z0-9@:%._\\+~#?&//=]" +
			"{2,256}\\.[a-z]" +
			"{2,6}\\b([-a-zA-Z0-9@:%" +
			"._\\+~#?&//=]*)")

	if (str == None):
		return False
	if(re.search(p, str)):
		return True
	else:
		return False

 frequency_Of_Smallest(n,arr):

def rh_ezlrw_URO(str):
	regex = ("((http|https)://)(www.)?" +

			"{2,256}\\.[a-z]" +
			"{2,6}\\b([-a-zA-Z0-9@:%" +
			"._\\+~#?&//=]*)")

	if(re.search(p, str)):
		return True
	else:
		return False

import re
def is_valid_URL(str):
	regex = ("((http|https)://)(www.)?" +
			"[a-zA-Z0-9@:%._\\+~#?&//=]" +
			"{2,256}\\.[a-z]" +
			"{2,6}\\b([-a-zA-Z0-9@:%" +
			"._\\+~#?&//=]*)")
	p = re.compile(regex)
	if (str == None):
		return False
	if not((re.search(p, str))):
		return False
	else:
		return True

def\
 hamming_Distance(n1,n2) : 
    x = n1 ^ n2  
    setBits = 0
    while (x > 0) : 
        setBits += x & 1
        x >>= 1
    return setBits
